description: Triangular array read by rows: a(n,k) = Sum_{d|k} mu(d)*U(n,k/d)/n if k|n else 0, where U(n,k)=A047916(n,k) (1<=k<=n).
references: J. E. A. Steggall, On the numbers of patterns which can be derived from certain elements, Mess. Math., 37 (1907), 56-61.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 1..125 of triangle, flattened
C. L. Mallows and N. J. A. Sloane, Notes on A002618, A002619, etc.
N. J. A. Sloane, Notes on A002618, A002619, etc.
J. E. A. Steggall, On the numbers of patterns which can be derived from certain elements, Mess. Math., 37 (1907), 56-61.
J. E. A. Steggall, On the numbers of patterns which can be derived from certain elements, Mess. Math., 37 (1907), 56-61. [Annotated scanned copy. Note that the scanned pages are out of order]
mathematica: U[n_, k_] := If[Divisible[n, k], EulerPhi[n/k]*(n/k)^k*k!, 0]; a[n_, k_] := Sum[If[Divisible[n, k], MoebiusMu[d]*U[n, k/d], 0], {d, Divisors[k]}]; row[n_] := Table[a[n, k], {k, 1, n}]/n; Table[row[n], {n, 1, 12}] // Flatten (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Nov 21 2012, after A047918 *)
prog: (Haskell)a047919 n k = a047919_tabl !! (n-1) !! (k-1)a047919_row n = a047919_tabl !! (n-1)a047919_tabl = zipWith (zipWith div) a047918_tabl a002024_tabl-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 19 2014
crossrefs: Divide n-th row of array A047918 by n.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
